config.customize-toolbar.name: Customize Toolbar
config.customize-toolbar.tooltip: Turn icons on/off and change their order.
config.play-sound.name: Play Sound
config.play-sound.tooltip: Play a sound when an icon is pressed
config.show-tooltip.name: Show Tooltip
config.show-tooltip.tooltip: Show or hide the tooltip when an icon is hovered
config.toggle-key.name: Toggle Key
config.toggle-key.tooltip: The key that toggles the toolbar icons.
config.visible.name: Show Icons
config.visible.tooltip: Show or hide the toolbar icons.
